explanation: [0-0] A flight attendant in a blue uniform and yellow scarf is standing in front of an airplane engine, smiling. There is a phone holder with a ring light in front of her, and a mobile phone is mounted on the holder. Part of the plane, including the wings and engine, can be seen in the background.

[0-3] The flight attendant in the blue uniform continues to smile and dance in front of the engine. Her arms are crossed over her chest, swaying left and right, while her hips also twist from side to side.
